title: Lakshmi Haar: Coral and Emerald Grandeur
features: This exquisitely crafted Haaram features a striking hexagonal pendant adorned with vibrant coral segments and sparkling diamonds, showcasing a contemporary take on traditional South Indian design. The pendant is anchored by a beautifully carved emerald drop, adding a touch of regal elegance. The layered necklace is strung with lustrous South Sea pearls, emerald beads, and coral elements, all meticulously arranged for optimal visual impact. Features a unique blend of traditional and modern aesthetics.
colors: Dominant hues of rich coral red
complemented by the vibrant green of the emeralds
the pristine white of the pearls
and the warm yellow of the gold. The diamonds provide a brilliant sparkle
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations such as weddings (Vivah)
and important religious ceremonies. Also suitable for upscale cultural events where a statement piece is desired.
description: This Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship, blending traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The use of high-quality natural gemstones, including vibrant coral and emeralds, ensures lasting beauty and value. Its bold design and luxurious materials make it a true heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
